name: jsonvalidator
description: JSON Schema Validator with Express backend and AWS Lambda support

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run copy-files && npm run copy-deps
scripts.copy-files: cp -r public dist/ && cp swagger.yaml dist/ && mkdir -p dist/data
scripts.copy-deps: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../deployment.zip .
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name json-validator --zip-file fileb://deployment.zip
